title: How home should feel.
posting_body: ['Centrally located in Aurora, CO, residents enjoy the convenience of nearby shops, restaurants and easy access to I-225, all while being tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city on 5-acres of lush landscaping surrounded by large evergreen trees.', '\xa0Lease at Vista Park Apartments today!', 'Hablamos Espanol!!!', 'This one bedroom one bathroom apartment features brand new appliances and walk in closets and hardwood floors.', 'Centrally located in Aurora, CO, residents enjoy the convenience of nearby shops, restaurants and easy access to I-225, all while being tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city on 5-acres of lush landscaping surrounded by large evergreen trees.', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'Units are available now, call for details!', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'Vista Park, managed by BLDG Management', '12707 E Mississippi Ave', 'Aurora, CO 80012', 'show contact info']
